name: Fise Legends
description:
Fise Legends is a mobile game where you have to reach the finish line and score a maximum of points by doing BMX or skate tricks. 

This game was a command for the FISE (International Extreme Sports Festival) and it was done in a period of 2 months in my second-year of Game Design Bachelor.  A Game Jam was organized to choose the game that would be developped in a full game and it was ours that got chosen.

On this project, I was mostly Artistic Director and Character Animator but I helped with the (simple but efficient) Game Design.  Due to the short timeframe and resources (we had to do this project in parallel of other courses, with a small team), the game is simple, in its mechanics as well as in its graphics, but I'm proud of the project we provided with such constraints. Despite this, I learned a lot during this first experience with clients and visibility.
